_sText: Of course you know boatescape, which originally wasn't made by me but by JJ45 If not: It's the goal to reach a chopper that brings you away from the zombies that will be blown up by a nuke after it took off. And of course you know that people are always falling off the chopper, so i fixed that.. (hope it works) and this is the only thing i changed, for any further changes could destroy the well-liked gameplay or reduce the FPS (i played 3_sn or so and it lagged on a big server...) Even adding light greatly reduces the FPS :/ Mainly fixed for Vampy's and Snipez's great zombie mod server! Hf, 50ae
